map.name_: The name of a map found in the desert.
map.name: Dusty map
map.text: A map of an unfamiliar place. There's a clear X marking something important.
flame.name_: The name of a fire npc character.
flame.name: Blue flame
flame.text: A small blue flame flickers angrily. I think it is annoyed.
fruit.name_: The name of a fruit found in the oasis.
fruit.name: Oasis fruit
fruit.text: A fruit that grows in the desert. It looks delicious.
